story.iWant: to enforce safe bounds on computed values
story.soThat: the agent never exhibits extreme or erratic behavior

context.applies: After ADAPT specs compute targets, before targets are stored
assumptions: Target values are normalized to 0.0-1.0 scale
Extreme values (near 0 or 1) can cause unnatural agent behavior
Confidence scores should be bounded to prevent overconfidence

parameters.name: Target Value Clamp Range
parameters.description: Prevents extreme target values that could cause erratic agent behavior

config.description: Clamps all behavior target values to this range

parameters.name: Confidence Score Bounds
parameters.description: Limits on confidence values to prevent over/under-confidence

config.description: Mock mode generates scores in this range and nudges targets toward center by this factor

parameters.name: AI Engine Settings
parameters.description: Temperature and other AI call settings

config.description: Low temperature for consistent, deterministic scoring

parameters.name: Aggregation Settings
parameters.description: Settings for time-weighted averaging of targets

acceptanceCriteria.title: Target Clamping
acceptanceCriteria.given: A computed target value outside safe range
acceptanceCriteria.then: Value is clamped to min/max bounds

acceptanceCriteria.title: Confidence Bounds
acceptanceCriteria.then: Confidence is clamped to configured bounds

constraints.description: Must never allow target values of exactly 0.0 or 1.0
